1439060.name: Raji: An Ancient Epic Soundtrack
1439060.description:
Immerse yourself into the world of Ancient India with the incredible soundtrack for Raji: An Ancient Epic composed by Linos Tzelos. Meet Gods and demons with this powerful music made by classic instruments.
Raji: An Ancient Epic is an action-adventure game set in ancient India. A young girl named Raji has been chosen by the gods to stand against the demonic invasion. She must use the powers granted to her by the gods to rescue her brother as she battles to face the demon lord Mahabalasura.

Tracks are provided in MP3 (320 kbit) and WAV with a total of 11 compositions.
